hero.title: Studio Recording Services
hero.subtitle: Professional Violin for Your Project
hero.description: Add the warmth and expressiveness of live violin to your recordings. I offer both in-studio and remote session services with quick turnaround.

services.title: In-Studio Sessions
services.description: Record in a professional studio environment with top-quality equipment and acoustics.

services.title: Remote Sessions
services.description: Send me your tracks and I'll record violin parts from my home studio, delivered digitally.

services.title: Live Tracking
services.description: Available for on-location recording sessions at your studio or venue.

steps.title: Send Your Project
steps.description: Share your reference tracks, sheet music, or a rough idea of what you're looking for.

steps.title: Review & Quote
steps.description: I'll review your project and provide a quote based on complexity and turnaround time.

steps.title: Recording
steps.description: I record your parts with professional quality and attention to detail.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: Receive your files in your preferred format, ready to mix.

cta.title: Let's Create Something Beautiful
cta.description: Tell me about your project and let's bring your vision to life.
